p: The radical scavenging activity of AECR and AECR-AuNPs was performed using the DPPH assay, according to a method by Shirwaikar et al. [ 22], with some modifications. Two mL each of AECR, AECR-AuNPs or quercetin (standard) was added to 2 mL 0.1 mM DPPH • (in methanol). An equal volume of DPPH • and methanol served as a control.
